section.name: Overview
section.p: The MimeType Service maintains mappings between MIME types and the corresponding file name extensions, and between locales and character encodings. The mappings are typically defined in properties or files located in user's home directory, Java home directory or the current class jar depending on the implementation.
It is written for use in Turbine but it can be used in any container compatible with Avalon's ECM container.
